persona.name: Tyler
persona.education: Columbia University – M.S. in Accountancy, concentration in Audit Analytics.
long_term_goals: Drive firm-wide adoption of AI-assisted audit procedures.
Teach as an adjunct professor of auditing.
Achieve partner track within six years.

occupation.title: Audit Supervisor
occupation.description: Oversees multiple concurrent engagements, ensuring budgets, timelines, and quality standards are met. Provides technical guidance on complex accounting areas and reviews all senior auditor deliverables.

persona.style: Strategic and data-driven; encourages solution brainstorming before setting directives.

traits: Open to calculated risk when piloting new tech.
Supports team autonomy while remaining accessible.

big_five.openness: High – champions experimentation with Gen-AI tools.
big_five.extraversion: Medium – engaging presenter, prefers smaller social circles.

general: Maintains a personal wiki of best-practice templates.
Runs 5 km during lunch breaks twice a week.

workday: Holds quick huddles to clear blockers.
Lunch on the go—usually a grain bowl.
Afternoons in partner debriefs and client status calls.

persona.health: Excellent cardiovascular health; training for NYC Marathon.

relationships.name: Rhonda
relationships.description: Senior he supervises and relies on for fieldwork execution.

relationships.name: Thomas
relationships.description: Manager who approves Tyler’s engagement budgets.

other_facts: Implemented an RPA bot that saved 600 staff-hours last year.
Completed three marathons, personal best 3 h 32 m.
